resources.string:
About AntellLMF food menu:

Application by Kari Honkasalo. Huge thanks to Arto Kärkkäinen who made the initial porting from native Java to Android. Without him this still would be just a plain Hello world!

The application pulls the food menu data from Antell's web page and uses JSoup to parse it. Changes to Antell's web page can break the logic behind parsing the data.

Please keep in mind that Antell's and Ericsson's logos are their property and I am using those without permissions. So please do not distribute this application outside LMF.
